The Russian Defense Ministry bombs seven targets under the control...
...of Islamic State militants in Syria in overnight attacks.
In the United States, authorities identify Chris Harper Mercer...
...as the shooter in the Umpqua Community College shooting that left ten dead.
In Burkina Faso, the leader of the short-lived coup, General Gilbert Diendere...
In Australia, a shooting outside a New South Wales police headquarters...
And finally from Israel, an Israeli couple was killed by Palestinian gunmen...
...while traveling with their four children in West Bank.
